medium: Glazed porcelain, enamel, gilt, silk cord
title: Potpourri container
description: round pierced container with small circular cover; rust-colored knotted cord attached to cover; three cartouches on sides of container, each with image of a lady wearing rust-colored garment, with yellow and pink curtains; cartouche on bottom with multicolored flowers; body of vessel is turquoise; rust-colored cover
creditline: Gift of the Helen D. Ling collection
